about_the_game:
Wanna Burrow of the Fallen Bear H-scenes in your pocket as well as check the backstage of the game?



This DLC contains a PDF document with all H-scenes presented in the game as well as backstage (in terms of art). You'll be able to check how we created the characters, their sketches, and much more. In other words, you'll get:


  • A PDF document with all H-scenes presented in the game as well as backstage including sketches from the scenes, characters' art process, and scenarios!

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Burrow of the Fallen Bear\Fallen Bear - Adult Art Pack.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: Burrow of the Fallen Bear contains strong language, partial and full nudity, and explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
